text: it used to be that if you wanted to rent

you went to Rosenberg was boat livery on

thirty in the afternoon Rosen burgers
was a blue-collar fisherman's paradise a
place rich in character and characters
and one of the last remaining fishing
stations in New York it had been in
operation for more than a century well
that's all over now Rosen burgers has
gone into receivership and trader John
has retreated down city island avenue
and is now selling nautical antiques out

kids faces and groups of people that
would go out and make a family dangers
from tradition they would go out because
that's when they did with their parents
and the parents would still go on

their father fishing he is surrounded by

wistfully of the closing which he blames

the winners too I mean I planned on
